moduleDescription: Structures, aerodynamics, systems and repairs for AME M1/M2.

sets.name: 00 – Aerodynamics
sets.subtitle: Basic aerodynamics and theory of flight.

sets.name: 02 – Assembly & Rigging
sets.subtitle: Assembly, alignment and control surface rigging.

sets.name: 03 – Aircraft Fabric Covering
sets.subtitle: Fabric materials, installation, inspection and repair.

sets.name: 04 – Metal Structural Repair
sets.subtitle: Sheet metal repair and structural practices.

sets.name: 06 – Wood & Structural Repair
sets.subtitle: Wood structures, inspection and repair methods.

sets.name: 07 – Advanced Composite Materials
sets.subtitle: Composite materials, repairs and safety precautions.

sets.name: 08 – Painting & Finishing
sets.subtitle: Surface preparation, painting, finishing and markings.

sets.name: 09 – Electrical Systems
sets.subtitle: Basic airframe electrical systems and troubleshooting.

sets.name: 10 – Instruments & Autopilot
sets.subtitle: Instruments, indication systems and autopilot basics.

sets.name: 12 – Hydraulic Systems
sets.subtitle: Hydraulic power systems, components and maintenance.

sets.name: 13 – Landing Gear Systems
sets.subtitle: Landing gear, brakes, steering and related systems.

sets.name: 15 – Ice & Rain Protection
sets.subtitle: Anti-ice, de-ice and rain protection systems.

sets.name: 16 – Environmental & Cabin Systems
sets.subtitle: Air conditioning, pressurization and cabin systems.

sets.name: 17 – Fire Protection Systems
sets.subtitle: Fire detection, warning and extinguishing systems.
